text:
iMatchative - San Francisco

We are looking for full stack Python and Java developers, Data Engineers & Data Scientists, Elastic Search Experts, Angular Experts and more.

Help us build a state of the art, two sided, cloud-based network that uses innovative algorithms, behavioral AND traditional financial statistics and analysis, to help investors and funds alike find stickier, more satisfying investments.

Find and apply for jobs here: http://imatchative.com/careers/
